analysis.description:
XRPCToken (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#96-103) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#96-97)

newCrowdsale.forwardFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- owners[i].transfer(amountToBeSent) (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#203)

newCrowdsale.majorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#120-121)
newCrowdsale.minorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#121-123)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#8-11): it allows old versions
Parameter '_daysToStart' of newCrowdsale.newCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#148) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_walletMajorOwner' of newCrowdsale.newCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x63506243ff39b29c42c5fa64c73139ea6b4e8fe2.sol#148) is not in mixedCase
